On face 1, create loop 1 consisting of 8 curves: 1. line_1: Starting at point [0.0942, 0.0], ending at point [0.1058, 0.0] 2. line_2: Starting at point [0.1058, 0.0], ending at point [0.5942, 0.0] 3. line_3: Starting at point [0.5942, 0.0], ending at point [0.6058, 0.0] 4. arc_1: Starting at point [0.6058, 0.0], with midpoint at [0.7, 0.0998], ending at point [0.6058, 0.1997] 5. line_4: Starting at point [0.6058, 0.1997], ending at point [0.5942, 0.1997] 6. line_5: Starting at point [0.5942, 0.1997], ending at point [0.1058, 0.1997] 7. line_6: Starting at point [0.1058, 0.1997], ending at point [0.0942, 0.1997] 8. arc_2: Starting at point [0.0942, 0.1997], with midpoint at [0.0, 0.0999], ending at point [0.0942, 0.0] Close the loop to form a complete shape. **Extrusion** Extrude the sketch along the normal direction by 0.0 units, and along the opposite normal direction by 0.015 units, creating a cut feature operation in the existing solid body with a sketch scale of 0.7.
